title: DocHub Schema Form JSON schema
description: This schema describes the form and data structure of a html form used in DocHub. It is used to generate a form using our Vue form renderer in the document.

formId.description: Form html id attribute, has no special meaning

formElements.description: Array of objects containing form element schema definitions, elements are rendered in the same order as they are defined

cancelText.description: Text on cancel button, if not present, cancel button is not rendered
